title: Thappellam Thappae Illai Lyrics Naan Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Singers: Aathi, Santhosh Hariharan
Lyrics: Ashmin
Movie: Naan
Music: Vijay Antony

Thappellam Thappae illai, Sariellaam sariyae illai
Thappai nee sariyaai seithaal, thappu illai thappu ilai

Open the doors lemme show you something
You gotto call me my name is salim
Everyday that I keep telling
let me go on, let me go strong..

Gaandhiyum .. thapputhaan senji thirundhinal
Move it move it always ..

Thappellam Thappae illai, Sariellaam sariyae illai
Thappai nee sariyaai seithaal, thappu illai thappu ilai

Open the doors lemme show you something
You gotto call me my name is salim
Everyday that I keep telling
let me go on, let me go strong

Paambil visham ullathendru
thooram thalli anji nirpaan
Pavam andha aadugali ulayil vaipaan

NIyayangalai pesum podhu
kholaiena thalli vaipaan
Kaiyil kathi ullavanai thalivan enbaan

Eppodhu poigal nee solvaayo
appodhu ulgail unnai pol? enbaar
Eppodhu unmai nee solvaayo
appodhu unnapol yemaali yaar enbaar

Thappellam Thappae illai, Sariellaam sariyae illai
Thappai nee sariyaai seithaal, thappu illai thappu ilai

Open the doors lemme show you something
You gotto call me my name is salim
Everyday that I keep telling
let me go on, let me go strong

Vazhkai oru poraatamthaan
vazhve oru viyabaramthan
Kelae neeyum vilundhuvittaal Pullum sirikum

Pogum dhisai yaavum unnai
poda endru solli solli
Maatrangal naalum unn nenjai kilikum

Boomithaan kaasuku Valaatum
pogalai thaalaatum unmaiku theemootum

Yekkangal indrodu pogattum
santhosam koodattum saabangal odattum

Thappellam Thappae illai ..
..
